plot: Is Dave Wertheimer's house being haunted? Is he losing his mind? Or is he just hearing things? Follow along and see, so that you too may be...One Step Behind.
title: One Step Behind
plot_es: Is Dave Wertheimer's house being haunted? Is he losing his mind? Or is he just hearing things? Follow along and see, so that you too may be...One Step Behind.
plot_en: Is Dave Wertheimer's house being haunted? Is he losing his mind? Or is he just hearing things? Follow along and see, so that you too may be...One Step Behind.
